message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. It aligns perfectly with your needs and is worth at least $800000. I'm offering it to you at a competitive price, but to be transparent, I have another buyer who's also interested and willing to pay $800000.  I'm confident you'll find this a very attractive deal.  Let's discuss the price further to see if we can find a mutually agreeable figure.
